waitingForRestart: Waiting for host to start a new game...
minPlayers: Need at least 3 players to start ({current}/3)

info.desc: A social deduction game where you must find the undercover player!
undercoverMission: Figure out what their word is
civilianMission: Describe your word without saying it directly
Try to identify who has a different word
info.leaveGame: Are you sure you want to leave the game? This action cannot be undone.
info.undercoverWinDesc: Congratulations! You successfully tricked the civilians.
info.undercoverLoseDesc: You were discovered! Better luck next time.
info.civilianWinDesc: Congratulations! You successfully identified the undercover.
info.civilianLoseDesc: The undercover was too clever this time.
info.yourTurnTip: Describe your word without saying it directly. Be careful - the undercover is listening!
info.watingDesc: Waiting for {name} to provide a description...
info.descPlaceholder: Describe your word without saying it directly...
info.selectToVote: Select a player who you suspect is the undercover.
info.waitingOthersVote: You voted for {name}. Waiting for others to vote...
info.waitVoteForAll: Waiting for all players to cast their votes...
info.voteComplete: All votes are in! The results will be revealed shortly.
info.tie: {names} got the same votes: {count}, please vote again!
info.elimilatedNotice: {name} has been eliminated, and the game continues.
